channel.title: Prayer errors
channel.description:
Hi, theres 2 errors with the prayer interface. Maybe someone here can help. First error: when i click on the prayer button, the prayer image dissapears but the button gets highlitghted. (see image bellow)
Second error: This one is more popular but i saw server which had this fixed. This one is in the prayer menu, at the bottom where it says how many prayer points you have left, the image beside it has a bad background. doesnt match the menu. Hopefully somone knows how to fix this. thnks (theres an image that shows this error too bellow)
Image: [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img523.imageshack.us/img523/372/errorsyx6.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://g.imageshack.us/img523/errorsyx6.png/1/][IMG]http://img523.imageshack.us/img523/errorsyx6.png/1/w229.png[/img][/URL]
thnks in advance

item.title: Prayer errors
